org.apache.flink.streaming.state

Class SimpleState<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.state.OperatorState<T>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.state.SimpleState<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the stored state object.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SimpleState<T>
extends OperatorState<T>
    Basic OperatorState for storing and updating simple objects. By default the whole stored object is checkpointed at each backup. Override checkpoint to allow a more fine-grained behavior.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
